sqls.sql: UPDATE pd_rmh_import_tmp SET rmh_id = @rmh_id, rmh_status = @rmh_status, rmh_no = @rmh_no, part_no = @part_no, part_idt = @part_idt, rmh_version = @rmh_version, rmh_revision = @rmh_revision, is_default = @is_default, rmh_desc = @rmh_desc, factory_no = @factory_no, rmh_type1 = @rmh_type1, rmh_type2 = @rmh_type2, pd_rmh_rmk1 = @pd_rmh_rmk1, pd_rmh_rmk2 = @pd_rmh_rmk2, pd_rmh_rmk3 = @pd_rmh_rmk3, pd_rmh_rmk4 = @pd_rmh_rmk4, pd_rmh_rmk5 = @pd_rmh_rmk5, pd_rmh_rmk6 = @pd_rmh_rmk6, rmh_wkn_num = @rmh_wkn_num, rmh_wkt_produce = @rmh_wkt_produce, rmh_unit_cost = @rmh_unit_cost, rmh_mtr_weight = @rmh_mtr_weight, print_times = @print_times, is_plan = @is_plan, crt_time = @crt_time, crt_user = @crt_user, crt_user_no = @crt_user_no, crt_user_name = @crt_user_name, crt_host = @crt_host, upd_time = @upd_time, upd_user = @upd_user, upd_user_no = @upd_user_no, upd_user_name = @upd_user_name, upd_host = @upd_host;
